basics.name: Sale Consultant
basics.label: Sales Representative
basics.summary: Sales Rep with two years in sales with vast industry knowledge. Independent worker with high energy and great communication skills. Customer service and sales expert who identifies customer needs and delivers solutions to problems.

work.name: Boost Mobile of Mobile Factory
work.summary: Answered all of the customers questions and addressed problems and complaints in person and over the phone. Helped customers select products that best fit their personal needs, and processed an average of 40 transactions each day in a timely manner.
highlights: Trained all new sales employees on effective techniques

work.name: Michael's Arts & Crafts
work.summary: Assisted customers with their needs, handled money throughout the day and gave change back.

work.name: Chicago Bakery
work.summary: Accepted payment from customers and gave the correct amount of change as needed. Cleaned up spilled food, drinks and broken dishes, and removed empty bottles and trash.
